targets.query: SELECT "gauge" FROM "pgpool2_pool_node_stat" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_frontend_used_ratio" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_frontend_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_frontend_total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_nodes_replication_delay" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("counter"),1s) FROM "pgpool2_pool_backend_stats_error_cnt" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("counter"),1s) FROM "pgpool2_pool_backend_stats_fatal_cnt" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("counter"),1s) FROM "pgpool2_pool_backend_stats_panic_cnt" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("counter"),1s) FROM "pgpool2_pool_backend_stats_select_cnt" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("counter"),1s) FROM "pgpool2_pool_backend_stats_delete_cnt" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("counter"),1s) FROM "pgpool2_pool_backend_stats_insert_cnt" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("counter"),1s) FROM "pgpool2_pool_backend_stats_update_cnt" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("counter"),1s) FROM "pgpool2_pool_backend_stats_ddl_cnt" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("counter"),1s) FROM "pgpool2_pool_backend_stats_other_cnt" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "role" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_total_count" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)

panels.title: Number of health check count in total

targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_success_count" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_fail_count" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_skip_count" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_retry_count" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_max_retry_count" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)

panels.title: Number of maximum retried health check

targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_average_retry_count" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)

panels.title: Number of average retried health check

targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_average_duration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_min_duration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_health_check_stats_max_duration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "hostname" =~ /$backend_nodes/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge") FROM "pgpool2_pool_cache_cache_hit_ratio" WHERE $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pgpool2_pool_nodes_status" WITH KEY = "hostname"
list.name: backend_nodes

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pgpool2_pool_nodes_status" WITH KEY = "hostname"
